(Original) This was a really cool (free!) place to visit on a Saturday. The close parking lot was full so we parked in the overflow which ended being great because there is a little center over there with energy games and activities. Bathrooms as well. Then we took a leisurely stroll to the center. There were several manatees in the water and a stingray petting area. Lots of boardwalks and it's kind of cool to see the power plant up close. Lots of activities for young kids scattered about as well as informational signs. Staff were friendly and we had a great visit!

topComments.author: Rebecca Jackson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ontem foi a segunda vez que pude experimentar e aproveitar o centro de observa√ß√£o de peixes-boi. A primeira vez em fevereiro eu vi toneladas de peixes-boi porque eles estavam meio que invernando l√°. Ontem, em abril de 2020, aproveitamos para caminhar pelas muitas trilhas naturais e ir at√© a torre de observa√ß√£o de 50 p√©s de altura! Ficou lindo e valeu a caminhada. Eu sugiro que pegue um mapa de trilhas, se houver, porque existem v√°rias trilhas e coisas para ver. Vale a viagem! Recomendo ver isso. (Original) Yesterday was the second time that I got to experience and enjoy the Manatee Viewing center. The first time in February I got to see tons of manatees because they were kind of wintering there. Yesterday in April 2020 we took the time to walk the many nature trails there and go to the 50 foot high look-out observation tower! It was beautiful and worth the walk. I would suggest though taking a trail map if there is one because there are multiple trails and things to see. Well worth the trip! Highly recommend seeing this. Especially in the winter months, but really anytime. The educational center was really nice and great for children also the butterfly garden and other exhibits there as well!

O estacionamento estava lotado, mas f√°cil de encontrar. Handicap acess√≠vel em todo o centro. N√≥s n√£o visitamos a loja de presentes devido √† longa fila para entrar. Manatees and Sting Ray up close for photos and experiencing. Great bird watching and plant life viewing also. The staff were amazing and very knowledgeable about the animals and plants. The parking lot was crowded but easy to find. Handicap accessible throughout the center. We did not visit the gift shop due to the very long line to enter. Restrooms are available on site. Highly recommend for guests of all ages and interests!

Parking and entry to view all attractions are free!! We all had a great time. Definitely will be back!

topComments.author: Renee Bertschinger (Renee B)

topComments.author: R S s
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma experi√™ncia diferente para tentar encontrar peixes-boi em seu habitat natural! Vimos muitos peixes, borboletas e p√°ssaros. O tanque de raios era muito bom, e eles batiam na superf√≠cie, o que era ador√°vel. O cais era uma boa caminhada, e eles tinham banheiros limpos e uma √°rea para lanches. Por favor, caminhe no caminho, eles aconselham isso fortemente.  (Original) A different experience to try to find manatee‚Äôs in their natural habitat! We saw lots of fish, butterflies, and birds. The ray tank was pretty awesome, and they flapped at the surface which was adorable. The pier was a good walk, and they have clean restrooms, and a snack area. Had to check out the gift shop, which did not disappoint! Indoors a face mask is required. There are nice activities for kids, such as coloring and playing with sand. Please walk on the pathway, they strongly advise that.

topComments.author: Anna Buccafuri
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nos divertimos muito no Manatee Viewing Center! Vimos MUITOS peixes-boi, tubar√µes, peixes, raias e at√© p√°ssaros. Eles t√™m uma trilha natural muito bonita que leva √† √°rea de observa√ß√£o, bem como um pequeno tanque de arraias onde voc√™ pode tocar as arraias. √â um lugar legal para ver a vida selvagem, tirar fotos e aprender sobre os animais. Embora n√£o tiv√©ssemos tempo para conferir, eles tinham uma loja de presentes e um Kona Ice Truck na propriedade, al√©m de muitas fotos. A √∫nica coisa que desej√°vamos que fosse diferente √© que a maioria dos peixes-boi est√° no lado mais pr√≥ximo da usina, ent√£o eles eram um pouco dif√≠ceis de ver de longe, mas fora isso adoramos. Este √© um lugar divertido para pessoas de todas as idades e √© imperd√≠vel em Tampa!  (Original) We had so much fun at the Manatee Viewing Center! We saw LOTS of manatees, sharks, fish, rays, and even birds. They have a really pretty nature trail that leads to the viewing area, as well as a little stingray tank where you can touch the rays. It‚Äôs a cool place to see wildlife, take photos, and learn about the animals. Although we didn‚Äôt have time to check it out, they did have a gift shop and a Kona Ice Truck on the property, as well as lots of photo ops. The only thing we wished was different is that most of the manatees are on the side closer to the power plant, so they were a bit hard to see from far away, but other than that we loved it. This is a fun place for people of all ages, and is a must-see in Tampa!

topComments.author: Logan Kirland
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta √© uma atividade gratuita incr√≠vel para toda a fam√≠lia. Apenas 25 minutos de Tampa e estacionamento abundante. Recomendo isso para a fam√≠lia ou uma data agrad√°vel e √∫nica.  (Original) This is an amazing free activity for the entire family. Only 25 minutes from Tampa, and abundant parking. Get there early to see the most wildlife, but manatees are always visible. Also have a stingray touch tank and numerous trails with lots to see. Highly recommend this for the family or a nice and unique date.

topComments.author: Suzanne Hnevsa

Mal posso esperar para ir novamente!  (Original) If you love seeing Manatees, then you need to visit here.  There must have been over 50 manatees in the river.  It was magical and beautiful!  Also a petting tank with stingrays, butterfly garden, and a very nice gift shop.  Admission is free, but donations are gladly accepted.  Volunteers were very knowledgeable.  I can't wait to go again!

topComments.author: Gene Ellis
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Informativo e divertido para toda a fam√≠lia! Incr√≠vel ver tantos peixes-boi, que entram nas √°guas mornas do canal de escoamento da usina. Os peixes-boi precisam encontrar √°gua morna no inverno porque podem morrer se a temperatura da √°gua cair abaixo de 68 graus, ent√£o eles entram no canal de sa√≠da para escapar das √°guas mais frias do Golfo do M√©xico.  N√£o h√° custo para entrar nesta instala√ß√£o. H√° uma loja de presentes, lanchonete, estacionamento gratuito, banheiros limpos e algumas exposi√ß√µes de natureza / educa√ß√£o.  Este √© um lugar divertido para uma fam√≠lia visitar. Acredito que esta instala√ß√£o esteja aberta apenas de 1¬∫ de novembro a 15 de abril, mas verifique o site.  (Original) Informative and fun for the whole family! Amazing to see so many manatees, who come into the warm waters of the outflow canal of the power plant. The manatees need to find warm water in the winter because they can die if the water temperature drops below 68 degrees, so they come into the outflow canal to escape the colder waters of the Gulf of Mexico.  No cost to enter this facility. There is a gift shop, snack bar, free parking, clean restrooms, and a few nature / educational exhibits.  This is a fun place for a family to visit. I believe this facility is open only from November 1st to April 15th, but check the website.

topComments.author: Luke Wallace

Tivemos um tempo maravilhoso aqui!!  (Original) What an amazing way to spend the day! And all for free! We got to pet sting rays, saw at least 50 manatees, walked trails, and they even have solar themed games you can play at the clean energy center! We had an awesome time here!!

topComments.author: Jerri Allaster
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para crian√ßas e adultos. Observe que, por enquanto, eles est√£o abertos das 10h √†s 17h. Para obter a experi√™ncia completa, use roupas apropriadas e sapatos de caminhada, pois voc√™ pode caminhar mais ou menos de uma milha. N√£o h√° cobran√ßa de entrada, mas eles t√™m uma caixa para doa√ß√µes perto da √°rea de observa√ß√£o do peixe-boi, e vale a pena. N√£o vimos nenhum peixe-boi de perto hoje, mas havia alguns √† dist√¢ncia. Muito bem conservado e vamos estar de volta!  (Original) Great place for kids and adults. Note that for now they are open from 10am - 5pm. However you must be off the trail to the tower by 4pm. There is a Cafe - no seating, icee stand and Gift shop. To get the full experience wear appropriate clothing and walking shoes as you can walk over or less than a mile. There is no charge for admission, but they do have a box for donations near the manatee watch area, and it is worth it. We did not see any manatees up close today, but there were some at a distance. Very well kept and we will be back!

topComments.author: Gene Wines

Ainda assim, tirei algumas fotos de outros pontos tur√≠sticos do centro.  (Original) A free, popular attraction in the Apollo Beach area, for the right time of the year that it‚Äôs open. Food/drinks seem reasonably priced at the building near the upstairs walkway.  It was a bit late in the season for seeing manatees as the water in the Gulf is pretty warm, and they gravitate towards the warm water of the Big Bend Power Station discharge when it‚Äôs colder. Still, I took some pictures of other sights at the center.

topComments.author: Ashley Carpenter
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um grande momento. √â muito relaxante ficar de p√© no cais esperando para ver o que aparece a seguir na √°gua. (Original) We had a great time. It's very relaxing standing on the pier waiting to see what pops up next in the water. We saw manatees, tarpon, a shark and a quite a few butterflies. They have a new interactive education center next to the cafe. They also had a Kona ice truck. Downstairs there is a stingray tank where you can touch them. Also a little sand box and chalk board downstairs. There are also a good amount of spots to sit down and eat.
